thread.section_title: Hotel Beauchamps - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, excellent breakfast
thread.title_full: Good location, excellent breakfast - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lluis_lsm
title: Good location, excellent breakfast
text: The hotel is in a nice location (Champs Ellysees), the rooms are quite new and clean, and the breakfast is super complete and excellent quality. I would recommend it, specially for business trips and young couples (I've been in the classic double room)
